The installer has a ascrypt_pro.dll and NOT just a usual ascrypt.dll, i tried moving a cracked ascrypt.dll and delete the ascrypt_pro.dll nut it gave  me a dll error

@jamesdude! that is odd because I only use one ascrypt.dll file for all my aerosoft products. All it is designed to do is bypass the registration and allow you to put in anything you want as opposed to the serial you should have if one purchases it. For example if you were to install aerosoft maderiaX and use the ascrypt.dll file to bypass the normal registration process, you can use that same ascrypt.dll fill for another aerosoft product. I only use one and not each separate ones that came with the downloads. All you do is over-write the existing one by replacing it and giving permission to copy over the first one. Do not delete it the original one, but replace it only. It will ask you if you want to copy over the original and once you hit yes, you will be allowed to put in what ever name and serial code you want.
